<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sustaining Spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=292)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 304 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If the spell’s duration is “sustained,” it lasts until the end of your next turn unless you use a Sustain a Spell action on that turn to extend the duration of that spell. 

<document level="2" id="action-73" />
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Sustaining Spells
